alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Monongalia; Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN GREENE... NORTHWESTERN MONONGALIA...NORTHEASTERN WETZEL AND MARSHALL COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 AM EST... At 1000 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Hundred, or 14 miles east of New Martinsville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waynesburg, Hundred, Cassville, Rogersville, Aleppo, Blacksville, Mount Morris, New Freeport, Spraggs, Wileyville, Knob Fork, and Pentress. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
